
# ![](ModernUI.png) 
# ModernUI Documentation
ModernUI is a framework library and a collection of custom controls for win32 assembler, created to help modernize the  standard win32 controls, and to add or emulate new control types and features of modern UX/UI designs and other graphical frameworks.

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/ModernUI-x86-blue.svg?style=flat-square&colorB=6DA4F8&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/ModernUI-x64-blue.svg?style=flat-square&colorB=6DA4F8&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI64) [![](http://img.shields.io/badge/Liberapay-Donate-yellow.svg?style=flat-square&logo=liberapay)](https://liberapay.com/mrfearless/donate)

For the x86 version of ModernUI, visit: [github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI)
For the x64 version of ModernUI, visit: [github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI64](https://github.com/mrfearless/ModernUI64).

If you like this project and would like to support me, consider donating via [Liberapay](https://liberapay.com/mrfearless/donate) or with bitcoin: `1LXcHrwMxij53UETjgmQwFPSM8EVjCoUgw`
